title: PSA about Sett
body: I don't care if you declared sett. If we're not blue side I'm not letting him though the ban phase. Especially if you're last pick. Please don't trollin my games :D

replies.body: What the hell are you talking about. And banning people's picks is an _amazing_ way to ensure you get people trolling you. If you want to mess up their pick and lane, you deserve it.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wN9nzZ4L,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-31T06:10:16.696+0000)
>
> What the hell are you talking about. And banning people's picks is an _amazing_ way to ensure you get people trolling you. If you want to mess up their pick and lane, you deserve it.

I completely disagree. Bans come before picks. Fuck your house rules making shit up that isnt part of how the game works just because you want it that way. What a petty reason to troll someone. Riots the one who implemented it that way, youre gonna troll me for using the system that Riot created? Im not even exploiting or abusing it. Literally just using it the way it was designed, and you wanna troll people because they used it to ban a champ they dont want to play with or against? Fucking horrible. I had a completely different impression of you, Im surprised you wrote that. Maybe i was thinking of someone else and got the names mixed up.

You seem to think i have some sort of power over how people react.

If someone hovers a champ and you ban it after they made it clear they intend to play it, the average salty low-ELO player is going to (usually correctly) assume you did it just to piss them off and will run it down mid while insulting your mother.

It is not about if that is a legitimate reaction or not, they will do it anyway.

If you ban my champ in ranked, I will fuckin run it down in game. I don't give a fuck your reports.
